Connection to a PostgreSQL database

Source: R/db_connection.R
db_connection.Rd

This function able to establish a connection with a PostgreSQL database.

db_connection(db_user, db_password, db_dbname, db_host, db_port)

Arguments

db_user

(character) Login or username for the database connection.
db_password

(character) Password for the database connection.
db_dbname

(character) Name/identification of the database.
db_host

(character) Host adress of the database.
db_port

(numeric) Identification of the port.

Value

The function return a format class PosstgreSQLConnection in the R's global envrionment.

Contents
